controls

Class StatusBarTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • controls.StatusBarTime

  • public class StatusBarTime
extends java.lang.Object
    Class StatusBarTime represents part on the status bar (first part from the top) displaying information about simulated application time. Pace of time can be set to different speeds, which can be selected by choice box.
    Author:
    Michal Rein, Ondřej Motyčka

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      Labels and it's string properties.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatusBarTime(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane statusBar)
      Constructor of time's status bar part, defines string properties, passes status bar handle and calls method setStatus() to create layout with all the labels, buttons and choice box.

    • Method Detail

      • setStatus

        private void setStatus()
        Create layout, labels, buttons and choice box. Set default values.

      • updateTime

        public void updateTime(java.lang.String newTime)
        Set updated time to timeProperty String property.
        Parameters:
        newTime - Updated time in HH:MM:SS format to be displayed.

      • switchTimeSpeed

        public void switchTimeSpeed(java.lang.String newSpeed)
        Set new time speed ratio based on the choice of user from choice box.
        Parameters:
        newSpeed - New speed ratio for pace of time.

      • setTimeHandle

        public void setTimeHandle(Time time)
        Set Time class handle.
        Parameters:
